text: Hi <@U021JKWA1GB>, it's not possible at the moment, but we are looking into this issue.
Can you help me understand if you are enhancing existing HubSpot capabilities, or building an integration for transactional emails?/

I believe existing HubSpot capabilities. Ideally I want to update the CRM cards content on the click of a button. Which i believe to be possible, but failing somewhere along the way. User clicks "Preview" > the card's content updates to show a preview of the content that would be injected into a transactional email.
